price: Neyͻnko (Soro abͻfoͻ a ͻka neho dabiara no) bεka sε: “Ne dwumadie ho Nwoma wͻ mehͻ, yawie (biribiara)”.
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
